radiographic_examinations.findings: increased infiltration in the right lower lobe
excluded local lesions in the nerve roots
questionable nonenhancing hyperintensity in the central pons and decreased ADC values
radiographic_examinations.changes_over_time: New nonenhancing lesions appeared on MRI on day 13 in both thalami with increased T2 signal

radiographic_examinations.findings: increased T2 signal throughout the midbrain, pons, medulla, and cerebellar hemispheres with increased ADC values in the pons and thalami
